snippet.title: Duru: A Game about Mole Rats and Depression – Gameplay Trailer 2021
snippet.description:
Duru is in its last months of development and we updated our demo with a new look and bug fixes. So we also have a new trailer for you!

What is Duru about?
In this 2D puzzle adventure you follow the story of Tuli – a story about the struggle with insecurities, depression and friendship, told in a colorful, accessible way.
Run, jump and paint your way through puzzle filled tunnels while also dealing with an unhelpful AI companion you just can't get rid of. 

You also can learn which behaviours are helpful and harmful for people dealing with this illness.

If you like our idea, feel free to test the new demo or help us by wishlisting Duru on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1387900/Duru

You can also find more information about us and our vision to destigmatize topics like mental health and cultural differences with games on our website:
http://www.twisted-ramble.com/duru
